title: USAunlocked
author: USAunlocked
created_time: October 03, 2023, 10:32:54 AMLast edit: October 26, 2023, 02:30:02 AM by USAunlocked
content: EU BIN Business debit card issuing account for sale. Account allows companies to instantly issue EU BIN Virtual Credit Cards. Multi-currency business bank account in the same name is included. Account is legally created using information we own. No hacked or stolen accounts. Wallester Issuing Account:Free Cards Included: 300Active Card Limit: UnlimitedPrice of Additional Cards: €0.35Monthly Fee: €0Bank Account:IBAN accounts included: 14Currencies: USD, EUR, GBP, CAD, JPY, CHF, SGD, CHF, CNH, HKD, NOK, NZD, SEK, AUDMonthly fee: $0Price: $200 or best offerPayment Method: Credit/debit card, BTC, LTC, USDCCustom account request accepted. Contact for pricing.t.me/USAunlocked

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: You need to let potential buyers know they can only top up the account by making a deposit from a bank account that's under the same name as the one Wallester is. No 3rd party transfers.

comments.author: USAunlocked
comments.body: Quote from: alterra57 on October 03, 2023, 01:33:22 PMYou need to let potential buyers know they can only top up the account by making a deposit from a bank account that's under the same name as the one Wallester is. No 3rd party transfers.3rd party receiving has been available for about 6 months now. Only the initial deposit has to be directly from a company account of the same name.

comments.author: Tisso
comments.body: Quote from: USAunlocked on October 21, 2023, 01:48:31 AMt.me/USAunlockedYou should be careful with this seller. I paid 2 weeks ago, but still have not received full access to my account. He says support is changing the credentials, but it's taking too long. Also, I have not received answers for 3 days, it seems that I was deceived.
